articles.content:
Chinese Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming and embassy officials on Tuesday helped members of the DPRK-China Friendship Thaekam Cooperative Farm in farm work. 
 The guests gave helping hands to farmers in rice threshing at a time when the farm is busy with harvesting, determined to make a tangible contribution to building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation by boosting the grain production.

MOU on Establishing Friendly Relations between Universities of DPRK and Thailand Signed
articles.content:
MOU on Establishing Friendly Relations between Universities of DPRK and Thailand Signed 
   Pyongyang, October 25 (KCNA) -- A memorandum of understanding on establishing the friendly relations between Kim Hyong Jik University of Education and Phranakhon Rajabhat University of Thailand was signed here on Tuesday.
 Present at the signing ceremony were Hong Il Chon, president of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned, teachers of the university, Preang Kitratporn, rector of Phranakhon Rajabhat University of Thailand, and his party on a visit to the DPRK.    
  MOU was signed by Hong Il Chon and Preang Kitratporn.
